content: controls capacity tokens for the On/Off CoD records. In a situation where a capacity token is used, the system deactivates the corresponding offering record. Therefore, you must prepare routines for catching the warning messages about capacity tokens being used, and have administrative procedures in place for such a situation. The messages from the system begin five days before a capacity token is fully used. To avoid capacity records being deactivated in this situation, replenish the necessary capacity tokens before they are used. Chapter 8. System upgrades 351 8.7 Capacity for Planned Event 8.8 Capacity Backup CBU provides reserved emergency backup processor capacity for unplanned situations in which capacity is lost in another part of your enterprise. It allows you to recover by adding the reserved capacity on a designated IBM Z system.
